name: Sleep, the blackbird
description:
Sleep the blackbird is a hand-drawn 2d puzzle game made in a form of comics with lovely watercolour illustrations and beautiful music. Follow the heart-warming story about Sonya and the blackbird who can't fall asleep. As the story unfolds, few puzzles will be on your way.

Created for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Controllers: up/down to move the camera view; mouse click to interact/open the next pad

Credits:

  • Art & Code: Anastasia Merzlaya
  • Music & Sfx: Alios

P.S.  The whole game was created during GMTK game Jam, but actually there are three more games about Sonya and the blackbird. If you enjoyed this game you might also check Sonya's other adventure:
https://anamerzlaya.itch.io/trust-the-blackbird
https://anamerzlaya.itch.io/follow-the-blackbird
https://anamerzlaya.itch.io/invite-the-blackbird

P.P.S. You can check more of my art here: https://www.instagram.com/ana.merzlaya/
